name: Ultimate Drift Car Racing HD
description:
Ultimate Drift Car Racing is the most realistic 3D drift racing simulation on mobile devices, and yet easy to control and fun to play thanks to an innovative drift helper.
Get ready to drive high performance cars (turbo or naturally aspirated) and make them drift at high speed in tracks designed specifically for drift racing.
if you are drift enthusiast, this is the game for You. Drift car racing for free.
- If you like to drift, get ready to spend many hours playing this game .
You will fill the roads with dust thanks to specially developed car physics and effective drift system for you to feel the real rally experience.
Full time racing and drifting style game.

Features

Offroad Dirt truck Racing.
Formula 1 Car Drift Driving.
Sports Car Race Mania.
High quality 3D graphics and Drift control!

Be a part of Furious Racing Drivers team.
Enjoy Dirt track racing , city mountain track race and many more select maps and start racing with opponents.
